name: at_home
formula: palms_in_polygon(datai, polygons = dplyr::filter(home, identifier == i), identifier)

name: at_school
formula: palms_in_polygon(datai, polygons = dplyr::filter(school, school_id == participant_basis %>% filter(identifier == i) %>% pull(school_id)))

name: at_home_nbh
formula: palms_in_polygon(datai, polygons = dplyr::filter(home_nbh, identifier == i), identifier)

name: at_school_nbh
formula: palms_in_polygon(datai, polygons = dplyr::filter(school_nbh, school_id == participant_basis %>% filter(identifier == i) %>% pull(school_id)))
